title: Single Family Home with Detached Studio – Grote Berg, Curaçao
description: Located in the desirable residential area of Grote Berg, this move-in-ready single-family residence offers the perfect balance of luxury living and investment potential. Set on 715 m² of owned land, the property features a thoughtfully designed interior with spacious living and dining areas, complemented by air-conditioning throughout. The modern gourmet kitchen is equipped with high-end finishes and premium appliances, ideal for both everyday living and entertaining. Outdoors, a large covered back porch overlooks the private swimming pool, creating an inviting space for relaxation and sunset enjoyment. A detached studio provides excellent rental income opportunities or serves as a private guest house. This turnkey property represents a rare opportunity to own a high-quality home in one of Curaçao’s most sought-after neighborhoods.
features: Spacious living and dining areas with air-conditioning
High-end gourmet kitchen with cooking island
Built-in wine cooler and integrated appliances
Soft-close cabinetry with premium storage solutions
Large covered back porch with open views
Detached studio suitable for rental income or guest accommodation
Fully fenced property with ample parking
